mapper.select: /* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectPopupList */ SELECT seq , use_yn , title , published_date , expiration_date , width_px , left_px , top_px , align , writer , content , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM popup WHERE 1=1 AND del_yn = 'N' AND use_yn = #{useYn} AND published_date <= #{today} AND expiration_date >= #{today}

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectBannerList */ SELECT seq , title , view_seq , writer , write_date , file_id_list , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM banner WHERE 1=1 AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY view_seq

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectTrainList */ SELECT seq , gbn , train_start_dttm , train_end_dttm , apply_start_dttm , apply_end_dttm , pay_sum , train_cnt , train_apply_cnt , next_time , train_note , exposure_yn , schedule_exposure_yn , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM train WHERE 1=1 AND gbn LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gbn},'%') AND exposure_yn = 'Y' AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY train_start_dttm DESC

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectNoticeList */ SELECT seq , lang , notice_gbn , title /*, content*/ , writer , write_date , view_cnt , file_id_list , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM notice WHERE 1=1 AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY notice_gbn DESC, write_date DESC LIMIT 5

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectPressList */ SELECT seq , lang , notice_gbn , title /*, content*/ , writer , write_date , view_cnt , file_id_list , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM press WHERE 1=1 AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY notice_gbn DESC, write_date DESC LIMIT 5

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectMemberSingle */ SELECT seq , id , password , grade , name , phone , email , keyword , sms_yn , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM member WHERE id = #{id}

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectResumeSingle */ SELECT seq , id , name_ko , name_en , phone , email , rrn , age , address , address_detail , top_clothes_size , bottom_clothes_size , shoes_size , participation_path , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM resume WHERE id = #{id}

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectBoardNoticeSingle */ SELECT seq , notice_gbn , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , file_id_list , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM notice WHERE seq = #{value}

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectBoardPressSingle */ SELECT seq , notice_gbn , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , file_id_list , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM press WHERE seq = #{value}

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectBoardNewsSingle */ SELECT seq , notice_gbn , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , file_id_list , del_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM newsletter WHERE seq = #{value}

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectFileIdSingle */ SELECT id , user_id , full_file_path , full_path , folder_path , full_file_name , uuid , file_name , file_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM file WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id} AND file_yn = 'Y' LIMIT 1

/* com.mtf.edumarine.mapper.EduMarineMapper.selectFileIdSingle */ SELECT id , user_id , full_file_path , full_path , folder_path , full_file_name , uuid , file_name , file_yn , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM file WHERE user_id = #{value} AND file_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY LENGTH(note) ASC, note ASC
